attributes.action: make judges, and those legal professionals working in the courts and public sector, democratically accountable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In my experience of the civil justice system I have found that the legal profession has hijacked the system. It is they and their judges who decide whether or not a civil writ is accepted for trial. This is too arbitrary and is subject to bias, especially if the writ is detrimental toward their own or other public professionals.
